text: Hybolasius postfasciatus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Stephan von Breuning in 1940. It is known from New Zealand.BioLib.cz - Hybolasius postfasciatus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1940
title: Hybolasius postfasciatus
